title: SUSE Going Private With a New Ownership Change
description:
SUSE announced that its majority shareholder Marcel intends to take the company private. Learn more about what this change means for SUSE.

The post SUSE Going Private With a New Ownership Change appeared first on Linux Today.

title: KDE Frameworks 5.109 Improves GPU Detection on Dual-GPU Systems
description:
KDE Frameworks 5.109 is here to improve the detection of graphics cards on dual-GPU systems. Learn more here.

The post KDE Frameworks 5.109 Improves GPU Detection on Dual-GPU Systems appeared first on Linux Today.

title: GNOME 44.4 Improves Epiphany, GNOME Software, More
description:
GNOME 44.4 brings a few changes to the Epiphany web browser, such as hiding the “Search the Web for” context menu item. Learn more here.

The post GNOME 44.4 Improves Epiphany, GNOME Software, More appeared first on Linux Today.

title: OBS Studio 30.0 Promises Intel QSV Support on Linux
description:
OBS Studio 30.0 promises Intel QSV support on Linux, WHIP/WebRTC output, HDR playback support for DeckLink output, and more.

The post OBS Studio 30.0 Promises Intel QSV Support on Linux appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Kubernetes 1.28 Improves Open-Source Cloud-Native Compute, Networking
description:
The open-source Kubernetes 1.28 is out with its second major update of 2023, introducing a long list of enhancements for operators.

The post Kubernetes 1.28 Improves Open-Source Cloud-Native Compute, Networking appeared first on Linux Today.

title: CrossOver 23.0.0 for macOS, Linux, ChromeOS Has Released
description:
CrossOver 23.0.0 includes an update to Wine 8.0.1, bringing with it over 5,000 changes that offer improvements to a variety of applications.

The post CrossOver 23.0.0 for macOS, Linux, ChromeOS Has Released appeared first on Linux Today.
